text:
@WhiteHouse Dear @realDonaldTrump , our Addled and Impeached @POTUS,
Are you out of your Bleeding Orange Mind!!! 
I think you are here to kill as many Americans as you can, because this is certainly a way to do it!

CoViD-19 is getting worse, and you are in denial!!!

#TrumpOwnsEveryDeath
